name: Hong Kong Poker
description:
Hong Kong Poker is a perfect offline version game for everyone. It 's really fascinating game that you can play it anytime, anywhere.

Hong Kong Poker is one of the most popular poker card games.

You win or lose not only depending on your cards on your hand, but also your thinking and guessing. Your hand may be not strong however you can win if you have a good stragegy and a bit lucky.

Let's play and think in Poker.

# Features
- No need internet connection
- All free
- Supporting multi-platform
- Friendly and easy to use interface
- Vivid sound and graphical effects
- Smart bot players

Beside, our studio also provide most of popular Vietnamese card games such as: Phom, Ta la, Mau binh, Tien len...

# Contact
